traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
